attributes.action: I have encoutered some underdogs which look and sound barbarians like
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i What should I do?
2 is there anyway I can get help?
3 Can I demand or claim for damage through delegate trade office?
4 Will you recommand any Attorney in Taiwan to resolve this tiny issue for your citizen?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
